Posts.Content: hi, had a radical mastectomy left side with senital node biopsy after being told I had DCISgrade 5 in two small area on 28/12/11 had great news last week told everything was all clear. went on my GP on line service to check my records to find i aslo had extensive LCIS but was not told about it. i am upset by this and not sure what to do.  i also have a painful rib under the scar how long does this last as it is very uncomfortable.  hope someone is able to help.
Posts.Title: LCIS and rib pain

Posts.Content: hi suzie, thanks for the reply its good to know i am not on my own, mastectomy for me is a strange thing as i have strange sensations and pain in my arm, rib, shoulder and just slight tenderness in the mastectomy area. not how i thought it would be. hope you are ok x
Posts.Title: LCIS and rib pain

Posts.Content: Thanks Suzie, you are so right I am impatient , but also over sensative to everything I think and feel. This cancer thing is so new i have not known anyone who has had it I am the first in the family and so I am on a steep learning curve.  I will stay positive and thanjs for the chat xx
Posts.Title: LCIS and rib pain
